verses.1: Sum bawl nadingin na sumte zang in. Ni khat ni peuh teh a meet na ngah ding hi.
verses.2: Na sumbuk vante mun sagih ah ahi a, mun giat ah ahi zongin khen kawikawi in. Hih leitungah bang thusia hong piang ding cih na thei khol kei hi.
verses.3: Meii sungah tui a tam luat ciangin leitungah guahin hong zu suk a, singkung khatpeuh a puk ciangin a pukna sansan ah om paisuak hi.
verses.4: Huih le guah ngakin khuahun hoih dong a ngak mi in khaici tuh ngei lo dinga, an zong la ngei lo ding hi.
verses.5: Nupi gai khat sungah nuntakna thak bangci kipat hiam, ci-in na theih zawh loh mah bangin na khempeuh a bawl Pasian º nasepna na thei zo ngei kei ding hi.
verses.6: Zingsang a kipan khaici tuh inla, nitak dong mateng khawl kei in. A vekpi-in a po kim ding ahi a, a khat sia-in, a khat a po ding ahi zongin na theih kholh bangmah om lo hi.
verses.7: Khuavak hoih mahmah a, i mit in nitaang a muh ciangin nuam mahmah hi.
verses.8: Mi khat sau veipi a nuntak le a nuntak sung nuam takin om tahen. Sau veipi tak a hing zongin a sih khit hun a sauvei zawkna phawk tahen. Mai lamah a lamethuai bangmah a om kei hi.
verses.9: Khangnote aw, na khangnona uh nuamsa unla, na khangno lai-un lungdam un. Na hih nop peuhpeuh uh hih unla, na ut bangbangun gamta un. Ahi zongin na gamtatna uh tawh kizui-in Pasian in thu hong khen ding phawk gige un.
verses.10: Note kilunggimsak kei unla, na pumpi uh gen theisak kei un. Bang hang hiam cih leh na khangno hunsung uh sauvei lo ding hi.
